src:
Oglasio se i Ostoja: Poznata beogradska kuhinja ponovo radi pred gradski derbi!
03 Nov 2019, 14:50 by Milos
KK FMP iz Železnika izdao je saopštenje u kojem je oštro kritikovao KK Partizan i predsednika crno-belih Ostoju Mijailovića, zbog dešavanja na meču ova dva kluba u ABA ligi.
Oglasio se i Mijailović, koji je u svom maniru preko Tviter naloga odgovorio klubu iz Železnika, aludirajući da je u pitanju neki drugi klub.
– Poznata beogradska kuhinja ponovo radi pred predstojeći gradski derbi. Nemate razlog za strah, imate mnogo veći budžet od KK Partizan. Za pobedu ćemo se boriti srcem, na parketu, a ne kroz medijska saopštenja, napisao je Mijailović na Tviteru!




POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Ostoja also announced: Famous Belgrade cuisine is back in operation before the city derby!
03 Nov 2019, 14:50 by Milos
BC FMP from Zeleznik issued a statement strongly criticizing BC Partizan and black and whites president Ostoja Mijailovic for playing in a match between the two clubs in the ABA league.
Mijailovic also responded, who in his manner responded to a club from Zeleznik via a Twitter account, alluding to the fact that it was another club.
- Famous Belgrade cuisine is again working ahead of the upcoming city derby. You have no reason to fear, you have a much larger budget than BC Partizan. We will fight for the victory with our hearts, on the floor, not through media announcements, Mijailovic wrote on Twitter!
